name: Shooting Star Seven
description:
Shooting Star Seven is retro arcade style gun & run game with modern anime graphics.
it will be freeware.
currently you can play Demo 2. next demo will come soon.

future plan is - after publish full version, I'll do some crowd funding and make Deluxe version, which have :

  • 960x540 res
  • improved graphics
  • local/internet co-op (stretch goal)
  • more levels (stretch goal)

the free version will remain free and will take major bugfixes.
